main event: A female civilian reported seeing a silver flash while driving on Highway U.S. 36 near Good Thunder, Minnesota, on June 13, 1955.
interesting points: The witness described the flash as similar to sunlight reflecting off a plane but noted that there were no planes in sight., The report involved acknowledgment from the Air Materiel Command regarding the witness's observation., A Navy commander reported seeing saucer-shaped objects that outpaced a Navy rocket., The commander believed these disks were spaceships from another planet operated by intelligent beings., The document is part of Project Blue Book, which investigated UFO sightings.
sighted object: a silver flash in the sky
witness description: female civilian, wife of the person who submitted the report
